structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Foods Containing Foreign Injury Causing Substances; Distribution Or Sale
law.text: Whoever sells, gives, or distributes to anyone candy or other food or foodstuffs containing a foreign substance, which is intended or may reasonably be expected to cause injury to a person eating the same, shall be punished by imprisonment in the state prison for not more than five years.
